nodes.bodyText: Note: the full card view is still active on the Data and Analysis pages
was this necessary for unit tests somehow?

The leftmost column in the RecentResourcesTable is populated with ResourceCards with menuOnly = true, so only the snowman menu appears.  data-page and notebooks-list set menuOnly = false so they continue to render the full cards.
Ah, I see. Would it make sense to pull the menu out and render it both here and inside the ResourceCard?
Good point - no need for ResourceCard to have this prop if we choose not to render the ResourceCard at all when menuOnly is true.
ooh, when did this get renamed? i like this name
I'm guessing a while ago, because this is the only name I'm familiar with
any way to do this with fp? nbd if not
i have a vague recollection of it being a PITA and may involve fp.flow and fp.toPairs
I did attempt fp - but I didn't get terribly far and decided this approach was pretty clear instead.
IIRC this is what allows the automagical sorting by each column?
